Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, excellent rooms. Really good value”
Reviews.Author: Soren95
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights at the Asuncion and were really pleased with the hotel. It is perfectly located within walking distance of the cool neighborhoods of Madrid, the rooms are clean and comfortable and overall excellent value. Only drawback is that our room was perhaps a bit noisy in the morning. Bring earplugs.

Reviews.Title: “A place to stay for a short time, cheap but good.”
Reviews.Author: Miko92
Reviews.Content: PROS Big comfortable beds, TV, Location is perfect (15m walk from Puerta del Sol), price is very fair, Free WIFI in every room. CONS Bathroom doors are not good, lack of intimacy. Do not stay if you look for luxuries, it's basic.

Reviews.Title: “They lost my booking”
Reviews.Author: Silverino
Reviews.Content: I booked a room through a main website and there were problems with the price: it was much higher then expected. I then cancelled the booking and contacted directly the Hostal. They answered, confirmed the booking with correct price and asked me to re-confirm few days before arrival. Unfortunately when I wrote back few days before arrival, they didn't keep my booking and they hadn’t any available room. I contacted them sending the emails we exchanged and they didn't even reply!! It’s not in the centre of the city, and with the same amount of money you can easily find better value. I definitely don't recommend this Hostal.

Reviews.Title: “it's more hostel than hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sindbad
Reviews.Content: Pros: + big rooms + very good location! + quite clean Contras: - VERY noisy: air conditioning works loudly, walls are thin so you will hear everything. - Staff do not speak English at all
